midnight.name: How about going to bar?
midnight.desc: There is a street that full of Bar in Hong Kong call Lan Qui Fong, you can enjoy your chill time here

morning.name: Would you like to see the sun rise?
morning.desc: The sun rise meaning the start of the day and you will see everyone wake up and the city start working at that time.

morning.name: How about a fishing village that can show you the old Hong Kong?
morning.desc: Sam Ka Tsuen is a village that closes to urban and have some good seafood to try

morning.name: Do you want to see a different view of Victoria Habour?
morning.desc: West Kowloon Cultural District is a new place that you see the west side of the Victoria Harbour

afternoon.name: lets take some amazing photo !!!
afternoon.desc: Choi Hung Estate is a popular place to take photo because of its colorful building background

afternoon.name: Can you image a seafront park in an indsutrial area?
afternoon.desc: Kwun Tong Sea Front is a place that is good for couple and have a nice walk, easy to reach as well

afternoon.name: Beside Star Ferry Pier that everyone knows, do you know Ocean Terminal Deck is also a good spot for outlook Victoria Harbour?
afternoon.desc: It is at the top roof of one of the famous shopping malls, it is easy to reach as you could follow the instruction inside the Ocean Terminal

afternoon.name: Have you ever thought about take a nice look of the Tsing Ma Bridge?
afternoon.desc: Ma Wan Beach is a good place that allow you view Tsing Ma Bridge closely, not just in car!

afternoon.name: How about a fishing village that can show you the old Hong Kong?
afternoon.desc: Sam Ka Tsuen is a village that closes to urban and have some good seafood to try

afternoon.name: Bored about Kowloon Park and Hong Kong Park? West Kowloon Cultural District is a new park that attracts many people visiting
afternoon.desc: In West Kowloon Cultural District, you could see the west side of the Victoria Harbour, which is amazing!

evening.name: Sun set in Hong Kong is nice
evening.desc: You may want to go Ha Pak Nai to see the sunset, it is really beautiful!!!

evening.name: Can you image a seafront part in an indsutrial area?
evening.desc: Kwun Tong Sea Front is a place that is good for couple and have a nice walk, easy to reach as well

evening.name: You can see beautiful sunset in many places, but do you know this one?
evening.desc: Sai Wan Swimming Shed is used by people for swimming in old days. It is open to public and you could see a very nice sunset!

evening.name: Beside Star Ferry Pier that everyone knows, do you know Ocean Terminal Deck is also a good spot for outlook Victoria Harbour?
evening.desc: It is at the top roof of one of the famous shopping malls, it is easy to reach as you could follow the instruction inside the Ocean Terminal

evening.name: Have you ever thought about take a nice look of the Tsing Ma Bridge?
evening.desc: Ma Wan Beach is a good place that allow you view Tsing Ma Bridge closely, not just in car!

evening.name: Bored about Kowloon Park and Hong Kong Park? West Kowloon Cultural District is a new park that attracts many people visiting
evening.desc: In West Kowloon Cultural District, you could see the west side of the Victoria Harbour, which is amazing!
